name: Ascent - A Roguelike Platformer
description:
Ascent is a 2D roguelike action platformer game by Sophie Berger, Kevin Chin, Chris Fung, Caleb Kellett, Sara Mohamed, and Suzuran Takikawa.

In Ascent, you fight your way up a mountain to defeat the evil sorcerer Izual. You will gain experience as you fight enemies, and you will choose mutations to make yourself stronger. Every stage is procedurally generated which means each run is unique. There are 3 distinct stages (excluding the prologue) plus a final boss fight.
